ai-ya8.1.2:1.1_3: and mind without hate as “mind without hate”;
ai-ya8.1.2:1.1_5: and mind without delusion as “mind without delusion”;
ai-ya8.1.2:1.1_6: He has said in brief a mind,
ai-ya8.1.2:1.1_9: and unexpansive mind gives rise to unexpansive mind.
ai-ya8.1.2:1.1_10: mind that is not supreme as a mind that gives rise to
ai-ya8.1.2:1.1_11: and mind that is supreme as “mind that is supreme”;
ai-ya8.1.2:1.1_12: and mind immersed in samādhi as ‘mind with immersion’.
ai-ya8.1.2:1.1_13: and mind not immersed in samādhi as “mind not immersed in samādhi”,
ai-ya8.1.2:1.1_14: When you’re freed, the mind arises.
